title: Consultations - Graf Center for Integrative Medicine | Englewood Health
description: Integrative medical consultations aim to identify underlying causes of illness rather than just managing the symptoms. Our medical director, Tracy Scheller, MD, will spend time with you to learn about your history and develop an individualized care plan.
cleaned_text: Consultations with Our Medical Director Integrative medical consultations aim to identify underlying causes of illness rather than just managing the symptoms. These medical consultations are a different approach to looking at the whole person in an in-depth way. We consider: - Dietary habits - Family history - Environmental and lifestyle factors - Interpersonal relationships - Stressors at home or work Our medical director, [Tracy Scheller, MD](/providers/tracy-scheller), will spend time with you to learn about your history and develop an individualized care plan. She will consult with your primary care doctor to ensure your safety. Insurance Coverage Medical consultations are typically covered by insurance. Check with your plan for coverage opportunities.
